articles.title: Tiananmen Square: Hong Kong police detain activists on anniversary of massacre - BBC
articles.description: Pro-democracy activists have been detained in a crackdown on marking the 1989 massacre in Beijing.
articles.content:
Police in Hong Kong have detained several pro-democracy activists on the anniversary of the Tiananmen Square massacre.

articles.title: ‘A first’ from Mars: European spacecraft sends livestream from red planet - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times.
